title: Sonoma
name: Sonoma Old School Skate and Surf
directions: about a 10 minute walk south of the Square
content: A classic California skateboard and surf shop (Sonoma is about 1 1/2 hours from the beach) with cool clothes for all ages of hip and cool. Bring your teen - there's a skate ramp out back that is popular after school and in the summer. SOS also has the best Mexican food truck in town that frequents out front - El Coyote.
